faq.question: What will happen when I’ve sent my application?
faq.answer:
Once you’ve submitted your application, our team will review it and get back to you within 3-5 business days.

You will receive an email confirmation, and if we need additional information, we will reach out to you.

faq.question: Can I get a free trial before I purchase?
faq.answer:
Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial so you can explore all features before making a decision.

If you decide not to continue, you can cancel anytime before the trial ends to avoid charges.

faq.question: What should I include in my personal statement?
faq.answer:
Your personal statement should include a brief introduction about yourself, your skills, and why you are interested in this opportunity.

Make sure to highlight relevant experience and what makes you a great fit.

faq.question: Will membership plans be charged automatically?
faq.answer:
Yes, all membership plans renew automatically on a monthly basis unless you cancel before your next billing date.

You can manage your subscription settings from your account dashboard.

faq.question: How can I contact customer support?
faq.answer:
You can reach our support team via email at support@example.com or through our live chat during business hours.

We aim to respond within 24 hours on weekdays.

faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq.answer:
We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all our plans.

If you are not satisfied, you can request a full refund within this period.
